kickstart.post:
if /usr/sbin/dmidecode | fgrep IPMI then /sbin/chkconfig ipmi on else /sbin/chkconfig ipmi off fi
# Load IPMI default settings only once, but keep a log of what we did.
if [ -f /etc/sysconfig/ipmi-settings ]; then . /etc/sysconfig/ipmi-settings mv /etc/sysconfig/ipmi-settings /etc/sysconfig/ipmi-settings.bak fi
